EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify that Loan Document Exception Date Has Passed
EmailTemplate.name: ET19 - Loan Document Exception Date has Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Loan Document Exception Date Has Passed - Loan "{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name} Team Member,
A Loan Document Exception Date for Loan {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name} has passed.
Loan Document Name: {!LLC_BI__LLC_LoanDocument__c.Name} Exception Date: {!LLC_BI__LLC_LoanDocument__c.LLC_BI__exceptionDate__c}
For full details: {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Link}.
nCino
ET19
